column2: "Na iyi nyinara na medze too m’akoma mu
column3: dɛ nkyɛ mobɔhwehwɛ iyi nyinara mu; dɛ atseneneefo
column6: wɔ Nyankopɔn nsamu: sɛ ɔdɔ o
column8: nyimpa nnyim; ɔhaw kor no ara na hɔn nyina wodua mu."

column2: "Adze nyina ba nyimpa nyinara do pɛr: esian kor na ɔwɔ hɔ ma atseneneefo na emumuyɛfo; ɔwɔ hɔ ma nyia ɔbɔ afɔr na nyia ɔmmbɔ afɔr: nyia ɔyɛ nyimpa papa
column3: na nyia ɔyɛ nyimpa bɔn so tse ara nye no; na nyia noho tsew na nyia noho nntsew so."

column2: "Iyi yɛ ɔhaw kɛse wɔ dza wɔyɛ no wɔ wi ase nyinara mu
column3: dɛ esian kor wɔ hɔ ma hɔn nyinara: ampaara so
column5: na abɔdam wɔ hɔn akoma mu ber a wɔtse ase

column2: "Na enyidado wɔ hɔ ma atseasefo nyina: osiandɛ bɔdɔm nyikan ye sen awendadze a oewu."
"Na atseasefo nyim dɛ wobowu ara: naaso ewufo dze
column4: eso wonnyi akatua bio; na werɛ efir hɔn ho nkaa."

column3: hɔn enyitan na hɔn enyiber o
column4: ahera dada; eso wonnyi kyɛfa biara bio ara da wɔ dza wɔyɛ no wɔ wi yi ase no mu."
na fa enyigye akoma nom wo nsa
column5: na Nyankopɔn enyi asɔ wo ndwuma dada."

column2: "Ma wo ntar nhoa daa; na mma mma seradze mmpa wo tsirmu."
"Enye wo yer a edɔ no no ntsena enyigye mu wɔ w’egyangyandze nkwa nda nyinara a Nyankopɔn dze ama wo wi ase no mu
column3: wɔ w’egyangyandze nda nyinara mu: na ɔno nye wo kyɛfa wɔ nkwa mu
column4: na wo berɛ a eberɛ wɔ wi ase mu."

column2: "Biribiara a edze wo nsa bɛka dɛ ereyɛ no
column6: anaa nyansa biara nnyi adakamona a erokɔ mu no mu."

column5: na dɛ ɔko nnyɛ ahoɔdzenfo dze
column7: dɛmara na boodoo nnyɛ enyansafo nko dze
column8: na eso enyimpa nnyɛ edwimfo dze; na mber na esian ba hɔn nyinara do."

column3: nyimpa nnyim ne mber so: dɛ nam a wɔdze eboa saw hɔn
column4: na dɛ nnoma a wɔpa hɔn efir mu no
column5: dɛmara so na wosua adasamba efir wɔ mber bɔn a ɔba hɔn do awerɛfir mu no mu."

column2: "Dɛmara so na mehu nyansa wɔ wi ase
column3: na ɔyɛɛ kɛse wɔ m’enyiwa do:"
na nyimpa kumaabi na wɔwɔ mu; na ɔhen kɛse bi soɛɛr do

column2: "afei wohun mu hɔ onyansafo hianyi bi
column3: na ɔnam ne nyansaa do gyee kurow no; naaso nyimpa biara annkaa ohianyi no."
Nyansa ye sen ahoɔdzen: kaansa woebu nyimpa hianyi ne nyansaa no enyimtsia
column4: na ne nsɛm so wɔnntse mpo a."

column2: "Enyansafo nsɛm a wɔka no komm no
column3: wɔtse no yie sen nyia odzi nkwasea do tum ne nkekamu no."

column2: "Nyansa ye sen akondadze: na dzebɔnyɛnyi kor sɛɛ papa pii."
